title: The Big Fat Fix (2016) WebRip 480p
description:
The Big Fat Fix is an independent co-production between Malhotra and former international athlete Donal Oâ€™Neill, producer of Cereal Killers (2013) and Run on Fat (2015).

It is a paean of praise to the Mediterranean diet â€“ but only â€¦ in its high-fat incarnations. Malhotra does not so much advocate for high saturated fat as for oodles of high-quality healthy fats, including saturated. He certainly isnâ€™t saturated fat phobic, as so many of his colleagues still are.

The Big Fat Fix is a remarkable movie. It gives bite-sized looks at food as medicine and diet and lifestyle in disease treatment and prevention. It spills the beans on misconceptions and vested interests behind global obesity and diabetes epidemics.

If you like the movie and want to support the producers, consider buying the download version or stream from http://www.runonfatmovie.com. They really have an important message to spread.
